00010 //Class Constructor
00011 ModelPlane::ModelPlane (ros::NodeHandle n) :
00012 kinematics(this), dynamics(this), airdata(this)
00013 {
00014         initTime = -1;
00015         init();
00016         tprev = ros::Time::now();
00017         states.header.stamp = tprev;
00018         //Subscribe and advertize
00019         subInp = n.subscribe("ctrlPWM",1,&ModelPlane::getInput, this); //model control input subscriber
00020         subEnv = n.subscribe("environment",1,&ModelPlane::getEnvironment, this); //dynamic environment effects subscriber
00021         pubState = n.advertise<last_letter_msgs::SimStates>("states",1000); //model states publisher
00022         pubForce = n.advertise<geometry_msgs::Vector3>("forceInput",1000); // forces publisher
00023         pubTorque = n.advertise<geometry_msgs::Vector3>("torqueInput",1000); // torques publisher
00024         pubLinAcc = n.advertise<geometry_msgs::Vector3>("linearAcc",1000); // Body frame linear acceleration - no corriolis effect
00025 }

00027 //Initialize states
00028 void ModelPlane::init()
00029 {
00030         XmlRpc::XmlRpcValue list;
00031         double temp[4];
00032         int i;
00033 
00034         // Set states message frame name
00035         states.header.frame_id = "bodyFrame";
00036 
00037         // Read initial NED coordinates
00038         if(!ros::param::getCached("init/position", list)) {ROS_FATAL("Invalid parameters for -init/position- in param server!"); ros::shutdown();}
00039         for (i = 0; i < list.size(); ++i) {
00040                 ROS_ASSERT(list[i].getType() == XmlRpc::XmlRpcValue::TypeDouble);
00041                 temp[i]=list[i];
00042         }
00043         states.pose.position.x=temp[0];
00044         states.pose.position.y=temp[1];
00045         states.pose.position.z=temp[2];
00046 
00047         // Read initial orientation quaternion
00048         if(!ros::param::getCached("init/orientation", list)) {ROS_FATAL("Invalid parameters for -init/orientation- in param server!"); ros::shutdown();}
00049         for (i = 0; i < list.size(); ++i) {
00050                 ROS_ASSERT(list[i].getType() == XmlRpc::XmlRpcValue::TypeDouble);
00051                 temp[i]=list[i];
00052         }
00053         states.pose.orientation.x=temp[0];
00054         states.pose.orientation.y=temp[1];
00055         states.pose.orientation.z=temp[2];
00056         states.pose.orientation.w=temp[3];
00057 
00058         // Read initial velocity
00059         if(!ros::param::getCached("init/velLin", list)) {ROS_FATAL("Invalid parameters for -init/velLin- in param server!"); ros::shutdown();}
00060         for (i = 0; i < list.size(); ++i) {
00061                 ROS_ASSERT(list[i].getType() == XmlRpc::XmlRpcValue::TypeDouble);
00062                 temp[i]=list[i];
00063         }
00064         states.velocity.linear.x=temp[0];
00065         states.velocity.linear.y=temp[1];
00066         states.velocity.linear.z=temp[2];
00067 
00068         // Read initial angular velocity
00069         if(!ros::param::getCached("init/velAng", list)) {ROS_FATAL("Invalid parameters for -init/velAng- in param server!"); ros::shutdown();}
00070         for (i = 0; i < list.size(); ++i) {
00071                 ROS_ASSERT(list[i].getType() == XmlRpc::XmlRpcValue::TypeDouble);
00072                 temp[i]=list[i];
00073         }
00074         states.velocity.angular.x=temp[0];
00075         states.velocity.angular.y=temp[1];
00076         states.velocity.angular.z=temp[2];
00077 
00078         // Initialize rotorspeed array
00079         states.rotorspeed.clear();
00080         states.rotorspeed.push_back((double) 0);
00081 
00082         // Initialize WGS coordinates
00083         if(!ros::param::getCached("init/coordinates", list)) {ROS_FATAL("Invalid parameters for -init/coordinates- in param server!"); ros::shutdown();}
00084         for (i = 0; i < list.size(); ++i) {
00085                 ROS_ASSERT(list[i].getType() == XmlRpc::XmlRpcValue::TypeDouble);
00086                 temp[i]=list[i];
00087         }
00088         states.geoid.latitude = temp[0];
00089         states.geoid.longitude = temp[1];
00090         states.geoid.altitude = temp[2] - states.pose.position.z;
00091 
00092         // Initialize control inputs
00093         input[0] = 0;
00094         input[1] = 0;
00095         input[2] = 0;
00096         input[3] = 0;
00097         input[5] = 0;
00098 
00099         // Initialize environment
00100         environment.wind.x = 0;
00101         environment.wind.y = 0;
00102         environment.wind.z = 0;
00103         // Read initial environmental data from parameter server
00104         if(!ros::param::getCached("/environment/rho", environment.density)) {ROS_FATAL("Invalid parameters for -/environment/rho- in param server!"); ros::shutdown();}
00105         if(!ros::param::getCached("/environment/groundPres", environment.pressure)) {ROS_FATAL("Invalid parameters for -/environment/groundPress- in param server!"); ros::shutdown();}
00106         if(!ros::param::getCached("/environment/groundTemp", environment.temperature)) {ROS_FATAL("Invalid parameters for -/environment/groundTemp- in param server!"); ros::shutdown();}
00107         // Set initial gravity in case environment node isn't up yet
00108         environment.gravity = 9.81;
00109 }

00112 //Make one step of the plane simulation
00113 void ModelPlane::step(void)
00114 {
00115         if (initTime > 0) {
00116                 dt = (ros::Time::now() - tprev).toSec();
00117                 }
00118         else {
00119                 if(!ros::param::getCached("simRate", dt)) {ROS_FATAL("Invalid parameters for -simRate- in param server!"); ros::shutdown();}
00120                 dt = 1/dt;
00121                 initTime = 1;
00122         }
00123         tprev = ros::Time::now();
00124         states.header.stamp = tprev;
00125 
00126         // Perform step actions serially
00127         dynamics.propulsion->updateRadPS();
00128         kinematics.forceInput = dynamics.getForce();
00129         kinematics.torqueInput = dynamics.getTorque();
00130         kinematics.calcDerivatives();
00131         kinematics.integrator->propagation();
00132         airdata.calcAirData();
00133         //publish results
00134         pubState.publish(states);
00135         pubForce.publish(kinematics.forceInput);
00136         pubTorque.publish(kinematics.torqueInput);
00137         pubLinAcc.publish(kinematics.linearAcc);
00138 }

00141 //convert uS PWM values to control surface inputs
00142 void ModelPlane::getInput(last_letter_msgs::SimPWM inputMsg)
00143 {
00144         if(!ros::param::getCached("airframe/deltaa_max", deltaa_max)) {ROS_FATAL("Invalid parameters for -airframe/deltaa_max- in param server!"); ros::shutdown();}
00145         if(!ros::param::getCached("airframe/deltae_max", deltae_max)) {ROS_FATAL("Invalid parameters for -airframe/deltae_max- in param server!"); ros::shutdown();}
00146         if(!ros::param::getCached("airframe/deltar_max", deltar_max)) {ROS_FATAL("Invalid parameters for -airframe/deltar_max- in param server!"); ros::shutdown();}
00147         //Convert PPM to radians (0/1 for throttle)
00148         input[0] = deltaa_max * (double)(inputMsg.value[0]-1500)/500;
00149         input[1] = deltae_max * (double)(inputMsg.value[1]-1500)/500;
00150         input[2] = (double)(inputMsg.value[2]-1000)/1000;
00151         input[3] = deltar_max * (double)(inputMsg.value[3]-1500)/500;
00152         input[5] = (double)(inputMsg.value[5]-1000)/1000;
00153         // std::cout << input[5] << ',';
00154         // std::cout << std::endl;
00155         if (inputMsg.value[9] > 1500) {
00156                 init();
00157         }
00158 }

00179 Airdata::Airdata(ModelPlane * parent)
00180 {
00181         parentObj = parent;
00182         airspeed = 0;
00183         alpha = 0;
00184         beta = 0;
00185 }

00193 //Caclulate airspeed and aerodynamics angles
00194 void Airdata::calcAirData()
00195 {
00196         double u = parentObj->states.velocity.linear.x;
00197         double v = parentObj->states.velocity.linear.y;
00198         double w = parentObj->states.velocity.linear.z;
00199 
00200         airspeed = sqrt(pow(u,2)+pow(v,2)+pow(w,2));
00201         alpha = atan2(w,u);
00202 
00203         if (u==0) {
00204                 if (v==0) {
00205                         beta=0;
00206                 }
00207                 else {
00208                         beta=asin(v/abs(v));
00209                 }
00210 
00211         }
00212         else {
00213                 beta = atan2(v,u);
00214         }
00215 }

00221 //Build integrator model
00222 Integrator * Factory::buildIntegrator(ModelPlane * parent)
00223 {
00224         int i;
00225         if(!ros::param::getCached("/world/integratorType", i)) {ROS_FATAL("Invalid parameters for -integratorType- in param server!"); ros::shutdown();}
00226         std::cout<< "building integrator class: ";
00227         switch (i)
00228         {
00229         case 0:
00230                 std::cout << "selecting Forward Euler" << std::endl;
00231                 return new ForwardEuler(parent);
00232         default:
00233                 ROS_FATAL("Error while constructing integrator");
00234                 ros::shutdown();
00235                 break;
00236         }
00237 }

00239 // Build aerodynamics model
00240 Aerodynamics * Factory::buildAerodynamics(ModelPlane * parent)
00241 {
00242         int i;
00243         if(!ros::param::getCached("airframe/aerodynamicsType", i)) {ROS_FATAL("Invalid parameters for -aerodynamicsType- in param server!"); ros::shutdown();}
00244         std::cout<< "building aerodynamics model: ";
00245         switch (i)
00246         {
00247         case 0:
00248                 std::cout << "selecting no aerodynamics model" << std::endl;
00249                 return new NoAerodynamics(parent);
00250         case 1:
00251                 std::cout << "selecting StdLinearAero aerodynamics" << std::endl;
00252                 return new StdLinearAero(parent);
00253         case 2:
00254                 std::cout << "selecting HCUAVAero aerodynamics" << std::endl;
00255                 return new HCUAVAero(parent);
00256         default:
00257                 ROS_FATAL("Error while constructing StdLinearAero aerodynamics");
00258                 ros::shutdown();
00259                 break;
00260         }
00261 }

00263 // Build engine model
00264 Propulsion * Factory::buildPropulsion(ModelPlane * parent)
00265 {
00266         int i;
00267         if(!ros::param::getCached("motor/motorType", i)) {ROS_FATAL("Invalid parameters for -motorType- in param server!"); ros::shutdown();}
00268         std::cout<< "building engine model: ";
00269         switch (i)
00270         {
00271         case 0:
00272                 std::cout << "selecting no engine" << std::endl;
00273                 return new NoEngine(parent);
00274         case 1:
00275                 std::cout << "selecting Beard engine" << std::endl;
00276                 return new EngBeard(parent);
00277         case 2:
00278                 std::cout << "selecting piston engine" << std::endl;
00279                 return new PistonEng(parent);
00280         default:
00281                 ROS_FATAL("Error while constructing Beard motor");
00282                 ros::shutdown();
00283                 break;
00284         }
00285 }

00308 // Build a new polynomial, reading from the paramter server
00309 Polynomial * Factory::buildPolynomial(char * baseParam)
00310 {
00311         int i;
00312         XmlRpc::XmlRpcValue list;
00313         char parameter[100];
00314         sprintf(parameter, "%s/%s",baseParam,"polyType");
00315         if(!ros::param::getCached(parameter, i)) {ROS_FATAL("Invalid parameters for -*/polyType- in param server!"); ros::shutdown();}
00316         std::cout<< "building a new polynomial: ";
00317         switch (i)
00318         {
00319         case 0: {
00320                 std::cout << "selecting 1D polynomial" << std::endl;
00321                 sprintf(parameter, "%s/%s",baseParam,"polyNo");
00322                 if(!ros::param::getCached(parameter, i)) {ROS_FATAL("Invalid parameters for -polyNo- in param server!"); ros::shutdown();}
00323                 int polyNo = i;
00324                 sprintf(parameter, "%s/%s",baseParam,"coeffs");
00325                 if(!ros::param::getCached(parameter, list)) {ROS_FATAL("Invalid parameters for -coeffs- in param server!"); ros::shutdown();}
00326                 double coeffs[polyNo+1];
00327                 if (polyNo+1!=list.size()) {ROS_FATAL("Polynomial order and provided coefficient number do not match"); ros::shutdown();}
00328                 for (i = 0; i <=polyNo; i++) {
00329                         ROS_ASSERT(list[i].getType() == XmlRpc::XmlRpcValue::TypeDouble);
00330                         coeffs[i]=list[i];
00331                 }
00332                 return new Polynomial1D(polyNo, coeffs);
00333                 }
00334         case 1: {
00335                 std::cout << "selecting 2D polynomial" << std::endl;
00336                 sprintf(parameter, "%s/%s",baseParam,"polyNo");
00337                 if(!ros::param::getCached(parameter, list)) {ROS_FATAL("Invalid parameters for -polyNo- in param server!"); ros::shutdown();}
00338                 ROS_ASSERT(list[0].getType() == XmlRpc::XmlRpcValue::TypeInt);
00339                 int polyOrder1 = list[0];
00340                 int polyOrder2 = list[1];
00341                 sprintf(parameter, "%s/%s",baseParam,"coeffs");
00342                 if(!ros::param::getCached(parameter, list)) {ROS_FATAL("Invalid parameters for -coeffs- in param server!"); ros::shutdown();}
00343                 int length = list.size();
00344                 if ((2*polyOrder2 + 2*polyOrder1*polyOrder2 + polyOrder1 - polyOrder1*polyOrder1 + 2)/2 != length) {
00345                         ROS_FATAL("Engine power polynomial order and provided coefficient number do not match");
00346                         ros::shutdown();
00347                 }
00348                 double coeffs[length];
00349                 for (i = 0; i < list.size(); ++i) {
00350                         ROS_ASSERT(list[i].getType() == XmlRpc::XmlRpcValue::TypeDouble);
00351                         coeffs[i]=list[i];
00352                 }
00353                 return new Polynomial2D(polyOrder1, polyOrder2, coeffs);
00354                 }
00355         case 2: {
00356                 std::cout << "selecting cubic spline" << std::endl;
00357                 sprintf(parameter, "%s/%s",baseParam,"breaksNo");
00358                 if(!ros::param::getCached(parameter, i)) {ROS_FATAL("Invalid parameters for -breaksNo- in param server!"); ros::shutdown();}
00359                 int breaksNo = i;
00360                 sprintf(parameter, "%s/%s",baseParam,"breaks");
00361                 if(!ros::param::getCached(parameter, list)) {ROS_FATAL("Invalid parameters for -breaks- in param server!"); ros::shutdown();}
00362                 if ((breaksNo+1) != list.size()) {
00363                         ROS_FATAL("breaks order and provided breaks number do not match");
00364                         ros::shutdown();
00365                 }
00366                 double breaks[list.size()];
00367                 for (i = 0; i < list.size(); ++i) {
00368                         ROS_ASSERT(list[i].getType() == XmlRpc::XmlRpcValue::TypeDouble);
00369                         breaks[i]=list[i];
00370                 }
00371                 sprintf(parameter, "%s/%s",baseParam,"coeffs");
00372                 if(!ros::param::getCached(parameter, list)) {ROS_FATAL("Invalid parameters for -coeffs- in param server!"); ros::shutdown();}
00373                 if (breaksNo*4 != list.size()) {
00374                         ROS_FATAL("breaks order and provided coeffs number do not match");
00375                         ros::shutdown();
00376                 }
00377                 double coeffs[list.size()];
00378                 for (i = 0; i < list.size(); ++i) {
00379                         ROS_ASSERT(list[i].getType() == XmlRpc::XmlRpcValue::TypeDouble);
00380                         coeffs[i]=list[i];
00381                 }
00382                 return new Spline3(breaksNo, breaks, coeffs);
00383                 }
00384         default: {
00385                 ROS_FATAL("Error while constructing a polynomial");
00386                 ros::shutdown();
00387                 break;
00388                 }
00389         }
00390 }
